save_model(path)[source]¶

The model is saved in h5 and JSON formats, the weights are saved in h5 format and the summary of the model (the network layers) is saved in a txt file.

Parameters

path (str) – Path to the different files

save_parameters(path, resolution, side, chr_test, epochs, batch_size, time)[source]¶

All the parameters of the training and test of the model are saved in a log file.

Parameters

path (str) – Path of the log file

Training of the Autoencoder model and set of the trained_model attribute.

Parameters

  • epochs (int) – Number of epochs

Hic¶

class src.hic.Hic(cooler, chrom, square_side)[source]¶
class Hic¶
This class groups informations about a Hi-C matrix.
cooler¶

Storage of the Hi-C matrix

Type

cooler

resolution¶

Resolution (or bin-size) of the Hi-C matrix

Type

int

chrom¶

Chromosome chosen among all chromosomes in cooler

Type

int

side¶

Number of raws and columns of a numpy array sub-matrix

Type

int

matrix¶

Hi-C matrix of the chromosome chosen stored in a numpy array

Type

numpy array

sub_matrices¶

The splitted Hi-C matrix into N sub-matrices of size side*side stored in a numpy array of shape (Samples, side, side, 1)

Type

numpy array

calculate_cum_length()[source]¶

Calculates and returns the cumulated length from chromosome 1 to N.

Returns

Informations on chromosomes, their length and cumulated length

Return type

Pandas DataFrame

plot_matrix(color_map, output_path)[source]¶

The Hi-C matrix is plotted in a file.

Parameters

  • color_map (matplotlib.colors.ListedColormap) – Color map for the plot

  • output_path (str) – Path of the output plot

plot_sub_matrices(color_map, output_path, index_list)[source]¶

40 random sub-matrices are plotted in a file.

Parameters

  • color_map (matplotlib.colors.ListedColormap) – Color map for the plot

  • output_path (str) – Path of the output plot

  • index_list (list) – List of the 40 sub-matrix indexes to plot

set_matrix()[source]¶

Set the numpy array Hi-C matrix of the chromosome chrom. The matrix is transformed into an upper triangular matrix and the values are converted in float32, rescaled by log10 and normalized.

set_sub_matrices()[source]¶

Split the Hi-C matrix of the chromosome chrom into N sub-matrices of size side*side. The empty sub-matrices (sum(values)==0) are ignored. The N resulted sub-matrices are stored and set in a numpy array of shape (N, side, side, 1).

class PredictHic¶
This class herits attributes and methods from Hic class and
groups informations about a predicted Hi-C matrix.

Sub-matrices predicted by a deep-learning model

Type

predicted_matrix¶

The reconstructed matrix from the predicted sub-matrices

numpy array

Construction and set of the predicted Hi-C matrix from the predicted sub-matrices.

Set the sub-matrices predicted by a deep-learning model.

write_predicted_matrix(threshold, output_path)[source]¶

The reconstructed and predicted Hi-C matrix is saved in a sparse matrix file.

Parameters

  • threshold (float) – The predicted values under the threshold will be set to 0

  • output_path (str) – Path of the output plot
